definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Our team has qualified for the semi ? final.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊已有資格進入準決賽。

sentences.english: The team qualified for the final after beating their opponent in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 這支球隊在準決賽擊敗對手後，獲得參與決賽的資格。

sentences.english: He will meet him in the semi-finals .
sentences.chinese: 裏德將在準決賽中與史東較量。

sentences.english: Harriman was the only USA player to make it to the semi-finals.
sentences.chinese: 哈里曼是唯一的美國選手，使其向準決賽。

sentences.english: Reed will be matched against Stone in the semifinal .
sentences.chinese: 裏德將在準決賽中與史東較量。

sentences.english: The bottom two teams from each group advance to the Plate semi-finals.
sentences.chinese: 未能出線的兩組進入銀碟準決賽。

sentences.english: Semi-finalists will perform their recital before an audience.
sentences.chinese: 準決賽將履行其演奏前的觀衆。

sentences.english: I'm proud of the boys, and we deserve to be in the semifinals.
sentences.chinese: 我以每一位球員爲榮，所以我們配得進入準決賽。

definition: (sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
to defend the crown (in sports championship)
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
